org.qbroker.event

Interface EventAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventActionGroup, EventAppender, EventPoster, EventScriptLauncher, EventSQLExecutor, EventSyslogger, EventTrapSender, FileSynchronizer, FormattedEventMailer

    public interface EventAction
    EventAction is an Interface for an action upon an event
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
